title: Understanding the Copy Function
text: When you use the copy function in a software application, the content is temporarily stored in a specific location. This allows you to paste it elsewhere later.

title: What is the Office Clipboard?
text: The Office Clipboard is a feature in Microsoft Office applications that allows you to store multiple items that you have copied or cut. You can then paste these items into your documents.

title: Identifying the Destination of Copied Content
text: When you copy content, where is it stored temporarily?
